Sorry lunch ended and I had to go to class. No one ever told me if my 
char can get in the Pack. I mentioned he could sense evil (probably 
some vague mind reading that would get you about as much info as the 
bios) so I'll say he's headed for the Pred base in Europe.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> OOC: I talked with both Hugar and Nemisis, Hugar doesn't see a 
> problem and says Nemesis can take it up with the council.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > OOC: Forget Omega, I just realized how many goodie goodies I 
have. 
> So 
> > I'm going to make to bad apples. This is the first one. It brings 
> up 
> > the question of: What did they do with the second blank after 
> reviving 
> > Optimus Primal.
> > 
> > After all this time the blank protoform still sits there where 
the 
> > Maximals have left it.  Finally, something clicks and the 
scanners 
> go 
> > online. It takes a lizard beast mode. Then from deep in the pit a 
> dark 
> > force, the Inferno himself arises to claim the body. A new spark 
> forms 
> > in it, Pure Black. Then the Maximal chip starts to work. The 
power 
> of 
> > the Inferno overrides it, but not totally. The spark turns blood 
> red. 
> > A new bot arises. He is engulfed in flame. He turns into a fairly 
> > handsome, red eyed, muscular bot, of pure evil. He can sense 
others 
> > with black hearts on this planet. Soon he will have servents to 
> obey 
> > his every wim.  He walks a few feet and stops.
> > 
> > Bot: SHADOW STAR, BLACK DRAGON MODE!
> > 
> > His size increases from 10 ft. to 20 ft. as he turns into a 
dragon 
> > (o.k. I confesse I'm sorta coping Cyberwolf). He flys toward a 
dark 
> > force.
> > 
> > OOC: We need to get a few things worked out for this one. For 
> starters 
> > even if he gets servants I don't want the chars. Next, if some 
> chars 
> > agree to serve him will he be allowed to alter their beast modes 
> like 
> > with himself (if you say yes their owners could decide how and 
> > naturally they'd change back if they broke up with him), and I 
can 
> > assume more servants means he's more powerful, and by the way is 
> there 
> > a spot open in the Pack it's hard enough to form one Faction 
he'll 
> > just try to take over the Pack one by one, oh and I don't think 
> Kitkat 
> > or Drillbit would like him becaus he has a girl problem (as in
